description: Gets a list of alert views.

parameters.name: isDescendingOrder
parameters.description: List preference indicating whether descending order is required.

parameters.name: sortName
parameters.description: Unique ID allotted to a view when an alert view is created.

parameters.name: viewType
parameters.description:
Supported values:
- All: Provides private and shared alert views of a client.
- Private: Provides alerts that are private to the logged-in user.
- Shared: Provides alerts that are shared across the client.
